title: Ex-president Vīķe-Freiberga's husband Imants Freibergs dies
summary_full: Computer scientist Imants Freibergs, partner of former President Vaira Vīķe-Freiberga, has passed away at the age of 91, Vīķe-Freiberga announced on social media.
summary_public: Computer scientist Imants Freibergs, partner of former President Vaira Vīķe-Freiberga, has passed away at the age of 91, Vīķe-Freiberga announced on social media.
